definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)

sentences.english: In addition, automatic-shift cars slide neutral, will cause damage to the car.
sentences.chinese: 另外，自动挡车子空挡滑行，还会对车子造成损害。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a sports car.
sentences.chinese: 你的汽车想配备一个手动挡还是自动挡？

sentences.english: Does your girl friend drive an automatic car?
sentences.chinese: 你的女朋友开自动挡的汽车吗？

sentences.english: Do you want manual or automatic transmission?
sentences.chinese: 你的汽车想配备一个手动挡还是自动挡？

sentences.english: I can't drive a stick. Do you have any automatics?
sentences.chinese: 我不会开手动挡的车。你有自动挡的吗？

definition: see 打檔車|打档车[da3 dang3 che1]
to put into gear/to engage the gear/gear change
(in a manual car) gear (i.e. reverse, neutral, 1st, 2nd etc)/(automatic car) transmission mode (P, R, N, D etc)/(electric fan etc) speed setting
discharge volume/engine capacity/engine displacement (volume of air fuel mixture drawn in during one cycle)
